Title: Aman | Personal Webpage
Name: Aman
Description: Pre-Final year Civil Engineering Undergraduate. Passionate about IoT, Web Development and Artificial Intelligence.
I grab every chance I get to travel, learn and create.
AboutContent: I'm a junior undergraduate completing B.tech in Civil Engineering.
I am passionate about working on Internet of Things and Web Development projects.
I, also like to tinker with microprocessors and microcontrollers.
I have a zest to solve the real-world problems through my engineering skills.
When not working, I love to listen to music, sketching portraits or doing cardio.
A die-hard fan of Elon Musk.
I love the way the concept of "work" has evolved over the past decades, and hence would love to travel and work together whenever I can.
WorkContent: I am currently full time Software Developer Engineer at Microsoft.

InternShips.name: Computer Vision Center, Universitat Autonoma de Barcelona

ProjectsStartLine: Some of the side projects I did can be found here :
CVStartLine: I am always open to collaborations with impactful work. Feel free to reach out if you want to work together :)
